SourceText: If someone makes you or anyone else feel uncomfortable with what they say or do, itâ€™s never okay! We all have the right to feel safe, especially at home ğŸ . Trust your gut. If you feel attacked by words or actions, your goal is to get away.

SourceText: Your voice can stop many attacks.

SourceText: Be clear, confident, and direct. Use your voice, body language, and eye contact. If you don't feel safe, you can do whatever it takes to get away.

SourceText: Using your voice can look different in different situations. You could shout "No!", call for help, act strangely to confuse the attacker, or negotiate.
